data.description_html:
You rip away some of the target's personal essence, temporarily damaging the target's essentia pool.
You deal 1d4 points of essentia damage plus 1 additional point for every three caster levels, to a maximum of 1d4+3 points at caster level 9th.
Creatures that do not have essentia pools suffer no ill effects from this spell.
Material Component: A tiny crystal vial.
data.name: Soul Blight
